scripts.update:
yarn install
sudo apt update
sudo apt install kotlin
scripts.start: read -p "Update the packages? [y/n] " answer && if test "$answer" = "y" || test "$answer" = "Y"; then sudo apt-get install kotlin; fi && kotlinc index.kt -include-runtime -d main.jar && echo '' && java -jar main.jar && echo '' && rm ./main.jar
